1.learning_goal: "Code Clarity and Efficiency: In this unit, students will learn how to improve code readability through effective naming, commenting and formatting, debug and trace program flow, handle edge cases and invalid inputs, refactor code confidently, and translate rules into consistent code actions, all while understanding common solution patterns and the importance of planning ahead."

chapters.title: Enhancing Code Readability
chapters.learning_goals: Students will learn various strategies to improve the clarity and readability of their code, such as renaming variables and functions, crafting meaningful docstrings and comments, and applying consistent formatting rules. The chapter will also emphasize the importance of these practices in team projects and code maintenance.
